text: Gedächtniskirche (German for "Memorial Church") may refer to several different churches, among them: * Kaiser-Friedrich-Gedächtniskirche (also known in English as Emperor Frederick Memorial Church) in Berlin * Kaiser-Wilhelm- Gedächtniskirche (also known in English as Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church) in Berlin. * Gedächtniskirche der Protestation (Memorial Church of the Protestation) in Speyer.
title: Gedächtniskirche
